questions.answer: I'm an AI chatbot. You can call me ChatBot.
I can chat with you, answer questions, and help with various topics. Ask me anything!

variations: what can I study at ESOFT
questions.answer: ESOFT offers a wide range of programs including IT, Business, Engineering, English, and Foundation courses. Visit https://esoft.lk/programmes for full details.
You can apply online through the ESOFT website or visit a nearby branch. The admission team will guide you through the process.

variations: what qualifications do I need to join
questions.answer: Entry requirements vary by program. Most diplomas require O/L or A/L passes. Contact admissions for specific criteria.
Fees depend on the course and duration. Flexible installment plans are available. Please contact our finance office or nearest branch for details.
Yes, ESOFT programs are recognized both locally and internationally. We partner with universities from the UK, Australia, and more.
Yes, many programs offer online and blended learning options through our virtual learning environment.
Yes, we offer scholarships based on academic merit and need. Contact the scholarship desk for application details.

variations: is there a branch near me
questions.answer: ESOFT has over 40 branches across Sri Lanka. Visit https://esoft.lk/locations to find the one nearest to you.

variations: what is the medium of instruction
questions.answer: Most programs are taught in English. Some support is available in Sinhala or Tamil based on the course and campus.

variations: what is the duration of the program
how many months does it take
questions.answer: Program durations vary: short courses may take a few months, while diplomas and degrees can range from 1 to 4 years.
